page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: Our block is an area of predominantly private housing. Properties range from large, mostly pre-war detached houses to small seni-detached cottages. There is a great variation in in thw age and design of properties: many have undergone modernisation. New development has been kept to a minimum, there being at present only one new housing development sited at Hough village, offereing a range of accommodation in detached and semi-detached houses and bungalows. A special feature is the imaginative planning of the streets and the planting of trees in and around the estate. Use has been made of reclaimed Cheshire brick to provide attractive frontages. A mains gas supply has recently been piped to Shavington, Basford, Rope and Hough as a result of pressure from local residents.
